website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch wine cellar keeps bottles protected at a consistent and stable chilling temperature. It operates quietly and looks great in any kitchen.
pros: Dual-pane glass door seals tightly, keeps out moisture, and blocks out UV light
Temperature range can be set easily for two zones and customized to wine type
Users like the smoked glass vs. clear glass as well as the overall appearance of the refrigerator
cons: The interior light is too bright for some
Longer or wider wine bottles will not fit the racks

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Unit - First unit upper compartment didn't get cold
customer_reviews.text: **Updated Review*** We had an issue with the top compartment not getting cold. They contacted us and send us a new one so we're all good now. Great to know they are paying attention and want to make things right. **Original Review** We've had it turned on for less than a month now and the upper zone no longer cools. We have it set to 46 degrees and it is at 70 degrees.It's actually warmer in the upper compartment than it is in our house so we're just putting our white wine on the counter instead of this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: IT CAME BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: I was researching for my next wine cellar/cooler and after careful reviewing I found that this one was the best. Unfortunately I saw a lot of reviews about the cooler arriving damaged, non the less today Sunday May 19, 2019 at around 11:20 AM and very exited I received my cooler, well it came with part of the door broken. Packaging looks solid and very good but you can tell that the product is of weak material.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Broken in under one year.
customer_reviews.text: So i read some decent reviews on this fridge and purchased for my wines. It looks great and easy to use. I set both at 55. Works great when it does work. In less than a year the bottom fridge breaks and now I have to take my wine out and chill it somewhere else. I messaged them hoping to get a new one soon. This should be under warranty. After a couple of days after emailing customer service, they said that they will replace it. I hope that The new one will last longer than a year. 3 stars for now due to their customer service. Hopefully the new one can last longer than a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Y.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in about a year - update - customer service replaced
customer_reviews.text: Update to this review- customer service contacted us and replaced the fridge. I liked this wine fridge when I purchased it - it's fairly small/sleek and did a decent job - until it didn't. I have had it for just over 1 year and the top half stopped working. I contacted customer service who couldn't help me since it had been past a year. For this price, I think a small wine fridge should work for much longer than 1 year. Pretty disappointed, I would suggest spending your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great price and delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I originally pictured it to be, but the description is exactly correct. It works as it should. The only criticism is of recovery time to the set temperature after the door has been opened to load the racks, but that is more an observation of operation than anything critical to the function. I would recommend this unit to anyone looking for a replacement for their countertop wine chiller-especially from this distributor as it was a terrific price delivered quite promptly. The exact model can be had elsewhere on the ‘Net with a much higher price and slower delivery time..
customer_reviews.author: nevada1/2rack

customer_reviews.title: Temperature settings
customer_reviews.text: Very nice appearanc and design. My only problem is the temp control on the upper section, which holds 8 bottles, can only be adjusted down to 54 degrees. The lower section can go much lower, but it seems this product was designed for white wine (16 bottles on the bottom). My problem is I want to keep the 6-8 bottles of white I keep on hand in the upper section, but can’t get the temp down low enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs constantly and is noisy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great looking fridge easy to set up, my only criticism is that it runs constantly and is very noisy!!! If there was a way to keep it from cycling on constantly and the noise it would be perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my different wines perfectly! It is quiet and I love the dual zones. The blue digital temperature display is very bright when in the dark. It is easy to program and even comes with a light to see what wines are inside without having to open the door. It goes well with my wine/coffee bar area.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival - twice!
customer_reviews.text: First cooler arrived and the digital display was damaged. Couldn’t change the temperature so requested a replacement. Second unit arrived and it was dented. The box was fine, but the unit was damaged on top and the back. Both have been returned and a refund has been requested. Looks like a nice unit if you can get one without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Drew R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product with slight background hum
customer_reviews.text: This dual-zone wine cooler works well. I've had it for a few months now. It keeps the temperature, and holds 24 bottles. The only drawback is that it has a constant soft background noise, less than when your refrigerator compressor kicks on, but constant instead of intermittent like your refrigerator. The noise is enough to hear in a quiet house but not enough to impede conversation. If you buy it, I suggest placing it in an area where the 10-15 dB noise is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet, But...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas present and, so far, it's doing it's job. The one big drawback is that the upper zone cannot be programmed to cool below 54°. Thus, if you decide to chill your whites in the upper at 49°, you cannot. And one little quirk that my unit has is that often the lower zone will read 52° and change back to 49° after a time.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Bazbal

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, hopefully the new one keeps working!
customer_reviews.text: The cooler worked for a few months, although it's louder than I like and seems to run nearly continuously, then stopped cooling in the white wine section. Also, it traps moisture inside, so if it's not running, it might result in your bottles growing mold, beware! However, I will say I had a really excellent experience with their customer service department, who were very accommodating about sending me a replacement unit, so props to them for that! Hopefully the new one will run better. It doesn't seem happy with the higher summer temperatures it's currently operating in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: plugged it in and ater 1 day it has been keeping steady temps. very easy to operate. NO NOISE... one thing to note. doesnt fit champagne style bottles or thick wine bottles very well. i shoved some in and it just left the shelf above by a bit. No problem really. just an observation. looks great and so far running great
customer_reviews.author: D Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: More wine...yes please
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that I would caution on is actually getting it to hold 18 bottles. Due to bottles varying in size, it's hard to get 3 across or if above/below vertically. Wish the shelving had more space in between as I have been unable to completely fill. Max I have been able to comfortably fit is 12 which is a bit of a bummer. As far as look and temp control, it's really nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Darling

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep set tempatures
customer_reviews.text: Over the last two months I have tried to get the lower portion up to 63 degrees and it will not go any higher than 57 degrees for my reds. As for the upper portion for the whites it is set at 52 and does not feel that cold at all... I can not set the temperature to reds and whites, depending on what I set it at it always just reads about 5 or 6 degree difference. I love the look and was so happy when I opened it, but does not seem to keep temps correctly.
customer_reviews.author: bcraw

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: This solid state wine cooler was able to reach temperature within eighteen hours and consistently maintain 54 for the whites and 60 for the reds. One big plus for this unit over the one it replaces is that based on one power outage it retains the thermostat settings. My previous unit if the power went off the unit reset its temperature to 62. Hopefully I will get a few years or more of use out of this unit as my experience with solid state coolers is there life is much more limited than units with compressors.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Duthie

customer_reviews.title: It's not quiet
customer_reviews.text: This has a fan that runs constantly. It's louder than the full size refrigerator in my kitchen. I've set both the top zone and the bottom zone of the chiller to 55 degrees, it is 70 in the dining room where this is located (in the shade, with ample ventilation on both sides and 3" from the wall). That means this thing only needs to reduce the temperature inside from an ambient temperature of 70 degrees in the room to 55 degrees inside the unit - a 15 degree difference....but for this unit, that is apparently a huge challenge. I should have returned this while the returns window was still open....don't you make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: DBS98121

customer_reviews.title: Holds 24 bottles
customer_reviews.text: The dual zone is great, does hold 24 bottles if they are your standard bottles. if its a little wide bottom on the wine bottle it does take up two spaces. But that is very rare for myself. Overall its been a great product. Easy to set temps and keep them locked in.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Fridge Does Not Last a Year
customer_reviews.text: This fridge worked great at first and was very quite. Unfortunately, the lower section of the fridge stopped cooling below 69 degrees after owning it for only 10-11 months. It has been stored according to the manual (house kept around 69-72 degrees year round), so I am very disappointed by the lifespan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Great Wine Fridge
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is exactly what I was looking for. It has two zones, but can be set to a temperature that stores my red wines. It looks really great, fits, my space, looks great, and would have gotten very near five stars except for one thing: It's nearly impossible to get the wine bottles onto the wire shelves, and into the cooler. I'm dumbfounded by this.?
customer_reviews.author: pbforty

customer_reviews.title: Broke two different times
customer_reviews.text: This product has broken twice on me now. The first time, when it arrived the top refrigerator could not keep cooler than 55 degrees. The company sent a replacement model, which struggled to keep temperature but at least usually stuck to the low 50s. Today, less than a year after purchasing it, the machine short circuited and no longer works at all. Spend a little more money and get a wine fridge that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Eff

customer_reviews.title: The top won't hold the temperature that its set at ...
customer_reviews.text: The top won't hold the temperature that its set at. Its set at 46 degrees and goes up and down between 46 and 50 degrees during the day. Unfortunately I didn't notice this until after the return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: N. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Bottles don’t fit, cheap engineering. Don’t buy this brand.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this looks but one major flaw: their engineers obviously don’t drink wine or know how to measure. The spacing is way too tight. Bottles are hard to get in and out. Scrape the labels off. Come on engineers, can you spend a few pennies and make the spacing/height 1/8 inch more per shelf. 1inch higher overall. When companies get this cheap, they lose my business forever.
customer_reviews.author: nvsurfn

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged - obviously had been dropped on a corner
customer_reviews.text: i am still hoping the replacement will be good, but my first try arrived damaged. sending it back. will update review if the replacement is better. UPDATE: replacement unit looks and works great. It is not as quiet as I would like - makes a pretty steady soft blowing sound.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says....and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This fridge both looks great and functions prefect. When I tested both compartments the temperature was true within 1-2 degrees. The light functions nicely but isn't too helpful in identifying bottles. All in all, does the job and I love the price. Recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as picture and marked. One uE for one week, hope quality will be good too
customer_reviews.text: Beatiful Wine Cooler, with separate (dual zone) zones for white and red wines. Just the right size for an ocasional wine drinker. The cooler is beatifully finished and for that price it is an incrediable buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely noisy and will only chill whites on top
customer_reviews.text: They don’t mention that you can only chill white bottles to temperature on the TOP. I drink more whites than reds and hoped to store them all in the bottom. The bottom will only chill to an appropriate temp for reds. I wouldn’t have bought it had I know that. Also it is extremely noisy. The fan is incredibly loud for a small refrigerator. I had hoped that it was just loud while getting it to the appropriate temperature but it’s been 4 days and it’s still super loud. I live in a city, don’t drive and foolishly threw out the packing material, otherwise I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Maren E Keyt

customer_reviews.title: I love this product...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wish it was 32 bottles plus champagne but I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this dual zone cooler after much research. It works very well and was easy to set temperature. Has a nice light inside. As others have said if you have an oversized bottle it will fit but you won’t get 18 in there. No issue for us. If the house is hot the temperature will go up a couple of degrees. Very quiet. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice little wine cooler for your everyday wine.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for about two weeks now but it is working well. It cooled down quickly and has had no problem maintaining temperature. You can't even tell it is running it is so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Luther Ward II

customer_reviews.title: A light humming
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in July and have had it about 4 months now and the thing runs flawless. Only one small complaint is that it does have a slight hum to it but you only really hear it after everything else in the room is shut off, other than that the fact it holds temp perfect is great. Looks awesome also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, wasn’t expecting much from a $220 wine fridge. Just expected it to do the bare minimum of keeping the wine at a constant temperature. This fridge definitely does that and is stylish as well! My apartment looks a little more classy with this wine fridge from Ivation. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very clean looking wine cooler that is quiet and keeps consistent temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Great looking 18- bottle wine cooler. It was a little slow getting down to the set temperatures but that is because I filled with 10 bottles right away. Within 8 hrs, it finally reached the correct temp and has had no problems staying there. Impressed with its super quiet operation. I did not observe any temp fluctuations, it keeps the temperature the same. For future buyers, let the cooler reach the set temperatures first before placing your wines in so you don’t worry that it’s not cooling fast enough. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN A

customer_reviews.title: Cooler keeps on running.
customer_reviews.text: As expected, the cooler took a while to reach the set temps and have been holding those settings although I did not use an external thermometer; one or two degrees either way doesn't concern me. BUT, it has been running for what seems like all the time. I'll be contacting the manufacturer directly to see what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: NJ/FLguy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, great value
customer_reviews.text: Silent, rock solid steady temp control. Tinted glass keeps sunlight/light away from the wine. Great economical addition for any wine lover.
customer_reviews.author: Swede Rock

customer_reviews.title: Dented through shipping
customer_reviews.text: I opened the wrap and find out its dented but can't return it because I unwrapped it after 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Company is really helpful and easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: updated: we ordered one and it did arrive with damage. The company was more than helpful though at getting us a new one and making sure we were happy customers. They were really easy to work with and very time efficient. We are enjoying our new unit. The new one sent is quiet, you can hardly hear it and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Holm

customer_reviews.title: excellent wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: although this is a lot more money than the basic wine cooler, it is a nice presentation with wooden shelves. holds 750ml skinny bottles 4 to shelf if the bottles are wider you have to remove a shelf to fit
customer_reviews.author: Que Sera Sera

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This dual zone wine refrigerator is a must have. It's the perfect size and I love how the temperatures are separate for the reds and whites. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this wine cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this wine cooler for 1 week, but am very satisfied with it. It is an excellent product at a great price. I set it up in a matter of minutes and set the desired temps. It has retained those settings, in quiet running (just a little hum), and is a nice looking appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Michaniw

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Wine cooler for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: I like the nice sleek decor of the outside. I like how it keeps wines the right temp for serving/sipping. I don’t like smaller cool White wine area verses lager Red wine storage area. I don’t like that it doesn’t fit the champagne/sparkling wine bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Vaughn-Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting to like this product as much as I do. It is relatively quiet and does what it’s is supposed to. It is also much more affordable then comparable products.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful wine fridge. It’s sleek and refined. The light is low and the temperature is spot on. Fits in my bar area. Quiet as can be. Holds all types of wine bottles.
customer_reviews.author: TRIPLE PS MOM

customer_reviews.title: Disarisfied
customer_reviews.text: Completely dissatisfied! Door was not connected and could not be fixed!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Product Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I bought. The first one was for a friend, and it needed to be replaced because the bottom section did not chill. I purchased a smaller version for myself, and the unit is damaged/smashed on the back corner. I am waiting for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Franke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has everything we were looking for. It's dual-zone with separate doors like a standard refrigerator, which is a very nice feature. It also holds whatever temperatures you set very effectively, and is EXTREMELY quiet. This unit is indeed freestanding, and I don't believe it should be installed under a countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Great temperature control, but does not fit all sized bottles.
customer_reviews.text: The dual temperature control works pretty well; the zone for the whites cooled off much quicker than the zone for the reds. The distances between the shelves is pretty small, so it makes taking out bottles a bit more difficult that you would want. Keeping champagne or even some bottles of pinots will require you to take out a shelf making the total capacity decrease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: top doesnt get cool
customer_reviews.text: bottom works fine but top only gets to 54. expected more for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Buy cheap, get cheap
customer_reviews.text: Won’t maintain temperature and goes from F to C at random.
customer_reviews.author: getyasum

customer_reviews.title: My wine is not chilled :(
customer_reviews.text: It’s quite enough and decent looking, but I want my wine, specially my white wine and rose, to be extremely chilled and even tho I have the temp set as low as it will go... it isn’t chilled at all. I think I’ve received a faulty one perhaps. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: tomato

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last even two years - poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler did not even make it to 2 years without breaking! The top zone (for white wines) currently reads 82 degrees :(. What a huge disappointment. It had a bit of a humming sound that was not terrible but expecting it to work beyond two years does not seem unreasonable. Would not recommend anything by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great wine fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike! I use it for wine and cheese making.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. 4eyes

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but it's quite loud
customer_reviews.text: It is quite noisy and also dissipates more heat than I would expect. Other thank that, the design is beautiful and it does the job, keeping the two different temperature levels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit champagne bottles 3 across.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit champagne bottles 3 across. Overall dimensions are too tight to fit even 3 regular bottles next to each other without scrapping the glass and label to force a fit.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, cools nicely, can't hear anything, super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, cools nicely, can't hear anything, super quiet. Dual zone is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good overall inexpensive wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice appearance with good dual zone temperature control. More noise than expected and continuous. Next to full size Subzero the wine cooler is much louder. Poorly designed handle attachment with 2 screws that leave a loose handle when fully tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hood

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY WITH MY WINE FRIDGE
customer_reviews.text: THE WINE FRIDGE LOOKS VERY SLEAK AND NICE. ITEM IS AS DESCRIBED. THE ONLY NEGATIVE I CAN SAY IS THAT IT HAS A SMELL OF LIKE HEAT. I HAVE IT ENCLOSED UNDER MY BAR BUT IS VENTIALTED SO MAYBE THATS THE REASON. BUT OVERALL, I AM HAPPY WITH IT AND SATISFIED WITH MY PURCHASE. WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Chris Elderkin

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, quiet, non professional wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is all that was advertised. It looks great, keeps the correct temperatures within 3 degrees, and has two doors which make it convenient for helping to maintain temperature control. It’s also easy to get “up and running”.
customer_reviews.author: CSchell

customer_reviews.title: The cooler has been working well for 2 months now ...
customer_reviews.text: The cooler has been working well for 2 months now. no issues. just don't expect to fit 18 bottles unless they are all standard bottles. If you have Syrah's or Merlot with wider bottles, you will have to remove one of the racks for your bottle to fit
customer_reviews.author: Shota Ban

customer_reviews.title: The only thing worst that this cooler is Ivation Support
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor. Don’t buy this! You are welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, good temp
customer_reviews.text: So far we are very happy. I have ours in our basement but I haven’t noticed it being excessively loud. It’s so nice to have the wine at a drinkable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyac

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was excellent no nicks or damage
customer_reviews.text: No problems thus far to new really give a lot of information works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: paul dombro

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set temp. Love how quiet it is. Fits perfectly in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: e.m. engelman

customer_reviews.title: Wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks, so far we’ve not had any issues. Never had a cooler for wine before and love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed
customer_reviews.text: The product arrive on time and perfect packing, after 2 weeks the temperature control stop working. It is always on 70F and it is impossible to set it below this. We called the company, we leave a message and so far we do not have any answer.
customer_reviews.author: Liza maria Garcia

customer_reviews.title: fan noise
customer_reviews.text: I returned the 18 bottle cooler because it looked so small and like a toy. The 24 bottle one that I got delivered was perfect in appearance and temperature control. But, it is quite noisy. I spoke to the customer service and they told me to give it a try for 48 hours to see if the noise goes down. If it doesn't, I will return it but it is a hassel.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son who reports it is quiet and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: No movable divider
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is you can’t adjust the divider. Would prefer to put 6 cooler whites on the bottom and 12 slightly warmer reds on top. Believe this would make machine more efficient. No directions showing since divider is electrically connected for lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: The box was intact but the top and back were dented .the fridge doesn’t seem to run right . Doesn’t shut off .not satisfied at all
customer_reviews.author: rosssdoyen

customer_reviews.title: Great wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little wine cooler. Very quiet and I love having the two separate compartments with their own temperature settings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 7 months
customer_reviews.text: After only 7 months, the lower portion of the cellar stopped working and the temperature would not get any lower than 69 degrees. It's cooler outside of this wine cellar than it is inside of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for me!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dual zone 18 bottle cooler. It’s not to large, stylist and meets my needs. As other day, you will have to take out a rack for champagne Size bottles but it fits standard 750ml just fine
customer_reviews.author: joiseygrl52

customer_reviews.title: Works great... for awhile
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this dual zone wine cooler for about 10 months. The upper zone has quit cooling. Temp stays at 67. It was exactly what I wanted but not if it lasts less than a year. Darn!! I just contacted customer service and they are sending me a new unit. Great service!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Viola

customer_reviews.title: Good design, efficiency, and great price for the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is quiet, good temperature control, and has a great physical look. It blends in perfectly with kitchen cabinet decor.G
customer_reviews.author: carlagfoster

customer_reviews.title: Backwards temperature
customer_reviews.text: Why is the top cooler the coldest? I would expect the warm red wine to be on top but the thermostat goes to 48 for top one but the lower cooler stays warmer This just seems backwards
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: After 30 days this product seems to be working great! It's a little loud but it's a fridge. Wish it was a little more spacious to fit larger champagne bottles
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not one, but 3!,
customer_reviews.text: I liked so much, I’ve purchased 3, one for myself and the other two for family over the year.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Milano

customer_reviews.title: Great wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great wine cooler, bought to store some of my wines, does pretty well in regulating temperatures. Isn't too loud, which is nice. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The Ivation dual zone wine fridge is a great fridge for the price. I like the compact size and relative ease of use. I have noticed the temperature fluctuates quite a bit over the course of the day. I am hoping that doesn't affect the maturity of the wine. Overall, for our small wine collection, this is a great fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, runs quietly and keeps the wine at the correct temperature. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Dual Temp Cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler! Arrived quickly and was easy to set up. I read mixed reviews about temp control and fan noise but have not had any issues with either. If you’re looking for a nice, mid sized wine cooler, I’d recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: John Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for red and white wine lovers. We placed under a counter in the kitchen. I have more refrigerator room now.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dean

customer_reviews.title: A bad wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Very poor temperature control. Simply does not work. No matter what room it is in or how distant it is from walls and appliances. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: rafael

customer_reviews.title: Slight hum
customer_reviews.text: It has a slight hum which is somewhat annoying and the handles were difficult to install. Also the item was dented in the back on arrival but I think that was from shipping. It doesn’t seem to affect the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Bottom section will not cool to set temperature
customer_reviews.text: The bottom section is set to 54 degrees, but will only cool to 63. Since this occured at 8 months it is out of Amazon return and support warranty. 8 months for this product is sad.
customer_reviews.author: Ohiohomesteadmom

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Keep in a bedroom closet and it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: George Jones

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 5 days
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for the girlfriend and after 5 days it developed a smell of burning plastic. The temp would also never stay at the level you set it at.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once up and running, love the fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Over all love the fridge. Handle installation was difficult, patience is required. The fact that a screw was missing did not help. As with so many products the directions leave a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Noisy motor
customer_reviews.text: Only issue motor make a noise when is running, but other than that fine
customer_reviews.author: Danmar

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, quiet, and functional. Had to have a second one sent since the first one arrived damaged badly. It was picked up promptly and new one delivered in a couple days. Thanks for easy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Was broken and dead in less than a year. Needed to be replaced in less than 6 months. Would never buy their products again. Horrible. And LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: MICH

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control is needy
customer_reviews.text: I find as the thermometer reaches mid 70's the upper section cannot keep up. Also the display is offset so that you cannot easily see the second number of the internal temp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Wine Chiller for the price
customer_reviews.text: Picked this for the dual zone capability and the temperature range as we like some of our whites on the colder side. We have only been using it for a few weeks now but it looks good and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: James A Lauschke

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than represented- 6 bottles in no way fit in the top section
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived and I'm still debating on whether or not to keep. My plan/hope was champagne on top and red wine below but there is no way 18 bottles fit in this. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first year, but at month 13, the bottom zone will not cool below 75. Very frustrating. Will spend a little more this next time and get a better product that last.
customer_reviews.author: Mkunkel

customer_reviews.title: It quit working less than 1 year after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Only 6 bottles could be cooled in the upper, cooler zone...and now less than 1 year after purchase, that zone is not working at all. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as it comes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit and good looking too! Excellent customer service,the best.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Mainguy

customer_reviews.title: Not working in Europe
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work in Europe even with a step down voltage converter
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo P.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is very LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: ALso, the shelves are poorly designed and hard to slide out/in. Overall this thing is a LEMON!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a year an a half. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bullano

product_meta.title: Ivation 18 Bottle Dual Zone Thermoelectric Red & White Wine Cooler/Chiller Counter Top Wine Cellar with Digital Temperature Display, Freestanding Refrigerator Smoked Glass Door Quiet Operation Fridge
product_meta.description:
Style:18 Bottle Dual ZoneThe Ivation Wine Cooler keeps your wine at the correct & consistent temperature and stable environment, protecting the wine from exterior lights and elements, and is specially built to have zero vibration, so the wine could be aged and stored properly, enabling it to preserve and develop its delicious flavor, Color & Aroma, with the best possible mouthfeel, body, palette and finish, serving you the best and tastiest wine that is Full, Rich, Supple, Smooth, Round, & Balanced 

A Must Have for Wine Lovers & Collectors
The only way to properly protect your wine is to store them in the Ivation temperature-controlled beautifully designed wine cooler, even for short term storage. Serving temperature has a big effect on how a wine smells, tastes and feels in your mouth, even a very good wine can be awful at the wrong temperature, likewise improper temperature can also shorten the wine’s life or ruin the wine completely, Regular refrigerators are not an option, as they are too cold for most wines, and “Room temperature” is too warm. 

Features & Specifications
Maintains the perfect temperature for red & white wines
Efficient thermoelectric cooling
Low noise, low vibration – will not disturb sediment
Touch controls and LCD display
Soft interior lighting with on/off control
Tempered smoked glass door
Solid, CFC-free polyurethane foam insulation Rated Power: 65W
Temperature Range: 46º – 64ºF (8º – 18ºC) -54º – 64ºF (12º – 18ºC) 
Unit Dimensions: 13.5" x 20" x 25.4" (34.5 x 50.8 x 64.5cm)
Weight: Net: 36.4 lbs. (16.5kg), Gross: 40 lbs. (16.4kg)

 Impotent Tip: Do not put your wine cooler in the garage. The big temperature ranges of a garage will make the cooler run too often, shortening its life. 

 Buy with confident:If you need help regarding any of our products, we have a dedicated team ready to assist you please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049
feature_bullets: WINE COOLER (wine Cellar / Wine Chiller) A MUST HAVE: The only way to protect the quality and taste of your wines long or short term, and ensure it AGES at a consistent level, the wine has to be stored in the correct environment and CONSISTENT TEMPERATURE, (ideally in the range of 55° F) This free standing innovative wine cooler will protect your red or white wine, preserving its quality and rich flavors, so you could enjoy its real taste to the fullest.

PERFECT Stable TEMPERATURE: The Ivation cooler enables you to store your wines short & long term in a consistent stable temp environment, and allows you to customize the temp to one that creates an ideal climate for your wines ageing process, Upper zone: 46º – 64ºF (8º – 18ºC), Lower Zone: 54º – 64ºF (12º – 18ºC), therefore bringing out the true characteristics and full flavor of your wines in the long-term. Quickly monitor and set temperatures in both temperature zones with touch controls.

HUMIDITY, MINIMAL LIGHT: Insulated with Solid polyurethane heavy foam (CFC-free) & Closed with Thermopane doors that are tempered smoked, to ensure an interior odor-free environment that maintains constant humidity, keeping the cork from drying out, thus preventing more air to come into contact with the wine, also to ensure darkness, blocking out sunlight and harmful UV rays that breaks down the complex molecules that create the special flavors in properly aged wines.

NO VIBRATION & SUPER QUIET: Specially built with an Energy-efficient thermoelectric cooling system with no compressor, to minimize the vibration effect and noise, allowing your wine to age and settle properly, with no disturbance to its natural occurring sediments.

FEATURES: Sleek design with exterior digital Touch controls and LCD temp (°F/°C) Soft interior lighting with on/off control 100% Customer Satisfaction GUARANTEED we stand behind our products and pride ourselves with exceptional customer service care. If you need help please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049.
